rules_text: When this creature enters, mill three cards, then you may exile an instant, sorcery, or Subroutine card from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of that card. If you don't, cache it. [i](You still pay its costs. To cache a card, exile it and create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
